title: White House defends security clearance process on Porter
text:
White House defends security clearance process on Porter 4:59am IST - 01:23 
The White House on Tuesday defended its handling of the background check for a former top aide accused of domestic abuse by two ex-wives despite contradictory comments by the head of the FBI earlier in the day. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The White House on Tuesday defended its handling of the background check for a former top aide accused of domestic abuse by two ex-wives despite contradictory comments by the head of the FBI earlier in the day.
